column4: Pidgin does not *yet* support webcam chat in WLM-protocal because they keep changing it to lock out 3rd party software.
I thought Pidgin doesn't have webcam support _at all_?
Apparently it shows the message that it is not supported ‘yet’ :-)

If I understand correctly, adding support for webcams and/or voice requires a lot of work, because Pidgin is essentially a GUI to the libpurple libs - and they must keep working without that GUI (on Finch, Meebo, etc).
